name: VR Ultimate Paintball: Heartbreak, Regret & Paintbots
description: VR Ultimate Paintball: Heartbreak, Regret & Paintbots focuses on an arcade style of gameplay. Containing four different game modes: wave based shooter, competitive target practice, challenging stage based trial map and an episodic story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: i5-4590 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 (VR) or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: i5-4590 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 (VR) or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1100 MB available space
